sentences.english: Are all students of the Department of International Finance here?
sentences.chinese: 國際金融系的學生是否都到了？

sentences.english: The development of financial circles and strick precaution of the risk are closely linked with disclosure of financial information.
sentences.chinese: 金融業的發展及其風險的防範與信息披露息息相關。

sentences.english: Will governments in the region maintain and even increase state ownership of financial institutions?
sentences.chinese: 這些地區的政府會保持甚至增容其國有金融機構嗎？

sentences.english: The financial restraint in rural areas is one of the bottlenecked factors in current new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 農村金融抑制是當前新農村建設問題的瓶頸因素之一。

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯大學的金融學教授陳志武也贊同這一看法。

sentences.english: THE old-fashioned financial system was like Old Maid, a parlour game once beloved of small children.
sentences.chinese: 老式的金融系統就象是小孩子喜歡玩的一種撲克牌。

sentences.english: International Finance Forum (CIFF for short) will be held in Shanghai Pudong on …
sentences.chinese: CIFF第五屆中國國際金融論壇。

sentences.english: Financial tycoons are notorious for their exorbitant salaries.
sentences.chinese: 金融大款們就是牛在高薪。

sentences.english: "We cannot allow a crisis in our financial system to become a crisis in confidence," he said.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能允許金融體系中的危機演變成信心危機。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a financial tool, in particular to a paper money counter.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及金融機具，特別是點鈔機。

sentences.english: Not for him the rough and tumble of the financial marketplace.
sentences.chinese: 當然他也不會在金融市場裏瞎攪和。

sentences.english: Europe and Asia are also suffering through financial turmoil, McCormick said. (See “World Markets Remain Hesitant Following Financial Rescue Plan.”)
sentences.chinese: 麥考密克說，歐洲與亞洲也因金融動盪受害。

sentences.english: But for the second day in a row, banking stocks in particular faced a rough ride.
sentences.chinese: 不過，在歐洲股市上，金融股連續第二天遭遇困境。

sentences.english: This research provides guidelines for financial institutions to choose future mergers and acquisitions targets.
sentences.chinese: 本研究亦可作爲未來金融機構選擇購併對象時之參考。

sentences.english: Can we take back our Country before we lose it to finantial slavery?
sentences.chinese: 國家成爲金融奴隸之前我們是否能拯救它呢？

sentences.english: Lehman Brothers was a symptom of a dysfunctional financial system and regulatory failure.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟是異化的金融系統和監管失敗的症狀。
